metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

criterions.comment: cmake: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
